body_html:
According to the documentation, it appears that TensorFlow should work on almost any Windows system. They only support and test on 64-bit, x86 systems that are Windows 7 or later however.

I'm unsure of why it didn't work for you. Did you read the documentation here?: Install TensorFlow on Windows

According to the documentation, it appears that TensorFlow should work on almost any Windows system. They only support and test on 64-bit, x86 systems that are Windows 7 or later however.
I'm unsure of why it didn't work for you.  Did you read the documentation here?: Install TensorFlow on Windows
body:
According to the documentation, it appears that TensorFlow should work on almost any Windows system. They only support and test on 64-bit, x86 systems that are Windows 7 or later however. 

I'm unsure of why it didn't work for you.  Did you read the documentation here?: [Install TensorFlow on Windows](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows)
